thread.title: Hands-free technologies pose unexpected dangers for drivers AAA
thread.title_full: Hands-free technologies pose unexpected dangers for drivers AAA

title: Hands-free technologies pose unexpected dangers for drivers AAA
text:
Hands-free technologies pose unexpected dangers for drivers: AAA 
Reuters Friday 23rd October, 2015 
n">Drivers can be distracted for as long as 27 seconds after performing activities such as changing music or dialing a phone number, even when using hands-free technologies, according to a study by the AAA Foundation for Traffic Safety....
